spec_data.Name: kfilefactory
spec_data.Description:
kfilefactory installs an action menu in dolphin.
It compresses a file or directory and uploads the resulting password protected
zip file to filefactory.com.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 26 Jul 2017 09:20:31 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An application for sharing files on FileFactory
